channel.title: Spellbook Names
channel.description:
Hey, i was just wondering how to change the spell names in the spellbook.
Thanks, Flyer

item.title: Spellbook Names
item.dc:creator: @Schilling Schilling
item.description:
@Schilling wrote:

[quote=“Mr. Despair, post:6, topic:338763”][quote author=Schilling link=topic=435151.msg3196792#msg3196792 date=1272862014]

IS in one of them files.
[/quote]No. If it doesn’t exist then it hasn’t been changed from the start, and no one has bothered to add them to the textHandler.

Why would it be in textHandler, it’s not even necessary to put it in there. It’d be in clickingmost and just find the packet.[/quote]He’s talking about just editing the text, why would it not be in textHandler?

I don’t even know what server I have, it’s called Project Czar, but if you take a look at the textHandler it does have the spell names in it.

Read full topic

item.title: Spellbook Names
item.dc:creator: @Mr_Despair Mr. Despair
item.description:
@Mr_Despair wrote:

[quote=“Schilling, post:5, topic:338763”][quote author=The Unholy link=topic=435151.msg3196061#msg3196061 date=1272807474]
IS in one of them files.
[/quote]No. If it doesn’t exist then it hasn’t been changed from the start, and no one has bothered to add them to the textHandler.[/quote]

Why would it be in textHandler, it’s not even necessary to put it in there. It’d be in clickingmost and just find the packet.

Read full topic

item.title: Spellbook Names

item.description:

ok well i have text handler but there is nothing about the spells at all and i dont have z-file searcher… how can i add it?

item.title: Spellbook Names

item.description:
@Schilling wrote:

Try the textHandler class, I noticed most servers these days have that. You should try searching for “Wind Strike” or something like that.
